mapper.select: SELECT id ,project_id ,parent_dir ,dir_summary ,files_summary ,files_count ,create_date ,progress_state ,progress_start_date ,progress_end_date ,delete_flag ,type FROM "DL_ORIGINAL_DATA" WHERE delete_flag = FALSE AND project_id=#{id} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id ,project_id ,parent_dir ,dir_summary ,files_summary ,files_count ,create_date ,progress_state ,progress_start_date ,progress_end_date ,delete_flag ,type FROM "DL_ORIGINAL_DATA" WHERE delete_flag = FALSE AND id=#{id} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id ,neural_network ,number_of_layer ,size ,number_of_class ,number_of_parm ,description ,architecture FROM "PRETRAINED_NETWORK" ORDER BY neural_network ASC
SELECT name ,parameter ,library_function_description FROM "NEURAL_LAYER" WHERE use_flag = TRUE AND library_object_name = 'keras.layers' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name FROM "NEURAL_LAYER" WHERE use_flag = TRUE AND library_object_name = 'keras.optimizers' ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT id ,progress_state ,command FROM "DL_MODEL" WHERE delete_flag = FALSE AND project_id=#{projectId} AND dl_original_data_id=#{orgId} AND (progress_state='success' OR progress_state='ongoing') ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT project_id ,dl_original_data_id ,command ,filepath ,filename ,network_summary ,train_summary ,validation_summary ,loss_summary ,accuracy_summary ,create_date ,progress_state ,progress_start_date ,progress_end_date ,delete_flag ,job_id FROM "DL_MODEL" WHERE delete_flag = FALSE AND id=#{id} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id ,progress_state ,create_date ,progress_end_date FROM "DL_MODEL" WHERE delete_flag = FALSE AND id=#{modelId} ORDER BY id DESC
